text:
It's being reported that the following White House Staff have been infected w/ #COVID19:

• Trump's Personal Valet
• Pence's Press Secretary
• Ivanka Personal Assistant
• 34 Secret Service Agents

If this is true, w/ high probability, 100% of the WH staff will be infected.
